company.vision: To organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
company.mission: To focus on customer obsession rather than competitor focus, continuous innovation, operational excellence, and long-term thinking.
company.description: Amazon is one of the world's leading technology companies, with a wide range of products and services, including e-commerce, cloud computing, and streaming video.
company.jobs_available: Software Engineer, Data Scientist, Product Manager

company.vision: To empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.
company.mission: To build the world's best software, hardware, and services, and to make them accessible and affordable to people all over the world.
company.description: Microsoft is another leading technology company, with a wide range of products and services, including the Windows operating system, the Office productivity suite, and the Azure cloud computing platform.
company.jobs_available: Software Engineer, Cloud Architect, Data Scientist
